tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_verification (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(255),
    dob DATE,
    address VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_verification (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    date_of_birth DATE NOT NULL,
    address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    verification_status BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE verification_documents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    document_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    document_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    document_expiry_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customer_verification(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_information (
	customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	customer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	customer_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	identification_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	identification_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE identification_documents (
	document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	customer_id UUID REFERENCES customer_information(customer_id),
	document_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	issue_date DATE NOT NULL,
	expiry_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE identity_documents (
    document_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customer_info(customer_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    document_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    document_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    issue_date DATE,
    expiry_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE customer_information (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(255),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  address VARCHAR(255),
  verification_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE document_information (
  document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  document_type VARCHAR(50),
  document_number VARCHAR(50),
  expiration_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customer_information(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE verification_history (
  verification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  verification_date TIMESTAMP,
  verification_result VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customer_information(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE verification_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  verification_id INT,
  log_text TEXT,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (verification_id) REFERENCES verification_history(verification_id)
);
